text: Estanislao Esteban Karlic (born 7 February 1926) is an Argentine cardinal of the Catholic Church. He was Archbishop of Paran√° from 1986 to 2003. He became a cardinal in 2007. He was born in Oliva, Argentina. Karlic is seen as theologically moderate. He has some conservative and liberal views.Latinamerica Press. Catholic bishops tend to be progressive on social issues but conservative in all other areas September 11, 2000Catholic News Agency. First and primary mission of disciple is to proclaim God, Argentine archbishop says May 17, 2007 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops Category:Archbishops
title: Estanislao Esteban Karlic
